name: Torpedo Ted
description:
Shoot through 6 challenging levels, and destroy many things along the way!

You can change abilities through the pause menu.

Controls

  • Move Ted: Mouse
  • Return to Title: Q
  • Pause: P
  • Mute Music: M
  • Move in Editor: WASD Keys
  • Place Obstacles: Left Click
  • Erase Obstacles: Right Click

Credits

  • SuperMakerPlayer - Programming, Level Design
  • TrafficConeGod - Programming
  • YoshiDev - Other

Based on Bullet Bill 3 by Psycosis91                   

Soundtrack made by Wolfgun

Game made using Godot Engine
